entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 11:28 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: N 35 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or snow or freezing rain in the morning. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
